# Package Mapmaker

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(mapmaker)
```

The package mapmaker include a single function designed to create maps from dataframes derived from NOAA coastline datasets that can be downloaded in .bna format from 
https://gnome.orr.noaa.gov/goods/tools/GSHHS/coast_subset

The .bna file can be uploded using read.delim function:
read.delim('filename.bna', sep=',', header=TRUE)

The function *mapmaker* will create a map from the dataframe.

```{r creating map}
mapmaker(bahamas)
```
